description:
An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The Sex Story continues with Ruby’s perspective, as she decides to antagonize Hunter and test the limits of his possessiveness by fooling around with the pool boy right in front of him. Will Hunter get jealous and stop her naughty game, or will he join the show?

Game description

Ruby & Hunter’s wild SEX STORY continues with another steamy episode written from Ruby’s perspective.

EPISODE 4 brings a horny Ruby back to Hunter’s place, intending to spend her day off rolling with him in his expensive sheets. But a business emergency keeps Hunter on the phone for most of the afternoon, ruining the sexy plans she had with him.
Luckily, the weather was great, so she decided to drown her frustration in cold Margaritas by the pool and kept herself busy by playing peek-a-boo with Hunter’s sexy pool attendant while he was on the phone.
A sneaky peek here, a sneaky peek there…the game kept her decently entertained until Hunter decided to honor her with his presence.

But Ruby is not a patient woman and doesn’t let Hunter’s ignorance slide.
She takes her little game further and starts fooling around with the pool boy right in front of her possessive lover.

Will Hunter get jealous and stop her naughty game, or will he surprise her by joining the show?
Follow the story and find out.
